faqs.question: What is the typical size range for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 63A Gurugram
faqs.answer: The typical super area for a 2BHK flat in the premium residential complexes of Sector 63A usually ranges between 1100 square feet and 1450 square feet. This variation depends on the specific project architecture the inclusion of balconies and the efficiency of the floor plan design. Prospective buyers should always confirm the carpet area versus the super area to fully understand the usable space they are acquiring.

faqs.question: Are the 2BHK projects in Sector 63A ready for possession or still under construction
faqs.answer: Sector 63A features a mixed inventory. You can find excellent options for ready-to-move-in 2BHK flats providing immediate occupancy and avoiding rental costs. Additionally there are several high-quality projects currently under advanced stages of construction which often offer lower entry prices and attractive installment-based payment plans for investors seeking capital appreciation upon project completion.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity from Sector 63A to the main business hubs like Cyber City
faqs.answer: Connectivity is one of Sector 63A’s strongest selling points. It provides easy access to the Golf Course Extension Road which connects directly to the main Gurugram city spine. Travel time to Cyber City is typically around 30 to 45 minutes depending on peak traffic conditions. The sector is also close to the HUDA City Centre and future rapid transit routes enhancing overall commuting convenience.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect when buying a new 2BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Modern 2BHK flats in Sector 63A projects come equipped with extensive lifestyle amenities. Standard offerings include 100 percent power backup secure basement parking 24/7 water supply high-speed elevators and comprehensive fire safety systems. Premium projects often add luxurious features such as dedicated sports courts multi-purpose hall fitness centres and landscaped podium gardens for recreational use.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63A a good location for investment purposes specifically for rental returns
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 63A exhibits strong investment potential. Its strategic location near the commercial belt and institutional areas along the Golf Course Extension Road drives consistent demand from working professionals. A well-maintained 2BHK flat generally commands competitive rental yields ensuring a reliable passive income stream for property investors.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for apartments in this sector
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary slightly between projects but typically range from INR 3.5 to INR 5.5 per square foot per month based on the extent of luxury amenities and the size of the project. This fee covers security common area upkeep utility bills for common facilities and the maintenance of recreational features like swimming pools and clubhouses.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and hospitals near the residential complexes in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 63A boasts excellent social infrastructure. Reputed schools such as Heritage School DPS International and Scottish High are easily accessible. For healthcare world-class hospitals like Medanta The Medicity and Artemis Hospital are located within a short drive ensuring high-quality medical services are always close by.

faqs.question: What documents are required to secure a home loan for a 2BHK flat in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: To secure a home loan you will generally need basic KYC documents proof of income such as salary slips or tax returns property specific documents including the Sale Agreement and project approvals and a clear title report. Our financial consultants are available to assist you in compiling the complete list of necessary documentation specific to your chosen 2BHK flat.

faqs.question: Are there any specific hidden costs I should be aware of besides the basic flat price
faqs.answer: When purchasing a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 63A always account for additional costs. These typically include stamp duty registration fees GST where applicable car parking charges development charges and the mandatory Internal Development Charges IDC or External Development Charges EDC levied by the government. Always request a full cost breakup from the developer or our sales representative.

faqs.question: What types of ownership status are available for 2BHK flats in Sector 63A Freehold or Leasehold
faqs.answer: Almost all multi-storey apartment projects and 2BHK flats in Sector 63A Gurugram are offered on a freehold basis. This means the buyer enjoys complete ownership rights over the dwelling unit and the proportionate share of the land underneath. This provides maximum security and stability for your property asset.
